notes.title: Author contributions
notes.p: V.D. and D.A. designed the study and methodology with substantial inputs from M.V., Y. Boucher and J.L. S.D., G.F., M.L. A.d.R., R.T. and V.D. extracted and compiled the historical data. V.D. analyzed the data. V.D. wrote the first draft with substantial inputs from D.A., M.V., Y. Boucher, J.L. and Y. Bergeron.
